I put this pole balancing demo together mainly just to test support
for Box2D and open GL based experiments in SharpNEAT.  The evolved
controllers are actually trivially simple but I thought it was a nice
demo anyway.

    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b4rfIcn2A_w

Colin
